page.title: 07WELBECK ESTATES COMPANY
page.content: The Welbeck Estates Company owns most of the land in this area. The Estates Office is the headquarters of the organisation and runs the Farms Department, the Woodyard and other associated activities. The Estates Company farms much of their own land, but due to the large areas involved, they also lease their land to tenant farmers who work the land in their own right. Other land and buildings are rented by a variety of firms. For example, a publishing firm use one building as a book warehouse while other sites are used by organ makers, surf-board manufacturers, an archery firm and a garden centre. Much of the rest of the land is used by Welbeck College as playing fields, accomodation and classrooms. Welbeck Abbey houses the college itself.
